avalancheActivity.highlights: Little snowfall in the last days. Thinn wind slabs possible in gullies and lows in W-facing aspects. Older snow is stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Some new snow in the mountains. Older snow underwent a lasting thaw and rain period and is stable. Thinn wind slabs may have formed in gullies and lows in W-facing aspects. Mountaineers are advised to be careful where slabs may have accumulated in terrain traps.

travelAdvisory.comment: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Evacuations in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. High avalanche danger is expected as the weather is passing, and wind slabs will likely form in gullies and on SW facing slopes. Decreasing precipitation and wind on Tuesday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Increased avalanche danger.

weatherForecast.highlights: Austlægar áttir og vægt frost næstu daga, en rigning eða slydda á fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs expected in S-W facing aspects after NE wind and snow. No reports of recent avalanches. Older snow is uniform and stable after thaw followed by freezing.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Rather little snow and thin snowcover. Small Wind slabs expected in S-W facing aspects after NE wind and snow. During mild weather and rain January 10th-15th, the snow melted, settled, and layers broke down.

travelAdvisory.comment: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Evacuations in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. High avalanche danger is expected as the weather is passing, and wind slabs will likely form in gullies and on SW facing slopes. Decreasing precipitation and wind on Tuesday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Increased avalanche danger.

weatherForecast.highlights: NA átt og lítilsháttar él á mánudag. Hæg breytileg eða suðlæg átt og að mestu þurrt þriðjudag og miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: One rather small avalanche fell in Siglufjarðarskarð by Siglufjörður on Monday 20.01. The avalanche did not reach the ski track.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Unstable windslabs, especially in westerly aspects after rather stiff NE and E wind and snowfall. Snow cover is variable between valleys. New snowpit form Siglufjörður on Tuesday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Unstable windslabs gullies and new slabs likely in westerly facing slopes after NE and E snow storm this weekend and Monday. Snow cover is variable between places in the forecasting area. Snow pit from Siglufjörður 21.01. showed stiff wind slab ontop of older stiffer firn, CP fractured between layers with medium force at 38 cm depth. Faceting grains were found near bottom of pit between firn layers, like pit on 10.Jan.

travelAdvisory.comment: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Evacuations in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. High avalanche danger is expected as the weather is passing, and wind slabs will likely form in gullies and on SW facing slopes. Decreasing precipitation and wind on Tuesday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Increased avalanche danger.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snýr í fremur stífa SA átt á fimmtudag, en austlægari aðfaranótt föstudags með snjókomu. Þegasr skilin hafa gengið yfir lægir og stöku él seinnipartinn og á laugardag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Avalanches released above Neskaupstaður on Jan 21st and 20th. On Jan 18th, a few avalanches released in the same areas and in Fannardalur.
avalancheActivity.highlights: It has snowed considerably during E-erly winds. A few avalanche have been reported

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed considerably in the Eastfjords and uncertainty phase is ongoing. Evacuations were made in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. New snow and thick wind slabs are present in the mountains, especially on S-W aspects and in gullies, which could be unstable at first.

travelAdvisory.comment: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Evacuations in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. High avalanche danger is expected as the weather is passing, and wind slabs will likely form in gullies and on SW facing slopes. Decreasing precipitation and wind on Tuesday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Increased avalanche danger.

weatherForecast.highlights: Dregur úr vindi og úrkomu á þriðjudag og kólnar. Hæglátt veður á miðvikudag en á fimmtudag er útlit fyrir SA-læga átt með dálítilli úrkomu.
